Published October 30 2014

Current for Mac

Current for Mac — A Facebook client for OS X. I rarely use Facebook (and when I do, it’s through the Facebook Paper iOS app), but Current looks really well designed. Available on the App Store for just $2 cheap.

Enjoy your day.
